Visualization

postprocessinglib.evaluation.visuals Module

The visual module contains different plotting functions for time series visualization. It allows users to plot hydrographs per station for each stations to allow us visualize the time-series data

Some of them also allow the addition of metruics to be placed beside the plots

Functions

histogram()

plot(dataframe[, legend, metrics, num_min, ...])

Create a compsriosn time series line plot of simulated and observed time series data

scatter()
